name: auto_complete
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool shazam.
Tool description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application such as shazam.com
API description: Fetch autocomplete suggestions for a given term using the Shazam API.

term.description: The word or phrase to get suggestions for (e.g., song title, artist name).

locale.description: The language code for the locale. Defaults to 'en-US'.
